Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
Violation of Advertising Policy - The brand name in your ad doesn’t align with the product you are advertising. Please make necessary adjustments to have your brand name align with your product.

It looks like your ad might have been flagged for not aligning the brand name with the product being advertised. To resolve this, make sure that the brand name used in your ad accurately represents the product or service you are promoting. You can review our Ad Policy and Guidelines for more details on how to align your brand name with your product. Here's a link to our Ad Policy: [Ad Policy](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25362604231053-Ad-Policy). If you have any further questions, feel free to ask!
